chunks.text: Keyboard Shortcuts & Tips Keyboard Shortcuts Boost your productivity with these shortcuts. Press '?' in the app to see this list. Shortcut Action C Create new task / Focus search bar ? Show keyboard shortcuts G then P Go to projects G then T Go to tasks E Edit current task Cmd/Ctrl + K Quick command palette Cmd/Ctrl + Enter Save and close Esc Close modal/dialog J / K Navigate down/up in lists X Select task (bulk actions) Pro Tips  Chain commands: 'G then P then C' = Go to projects and create new  Use Command Palette (Cmd/Ctrl + K) to search all actions  Customize shortcuts in Settings â†’ Keyboard
